2013-12-21T22:33:10Z.name: Asa James
2013-12-21T22:33:10Z.spouse: Queen Elizabeth III, (m. 1924–71, his death)Elton John
2013-12-21T22:33:10Z.children: Elton John II, Elizabeth VIII, Timbo (Pet monkey from aids relief)
2013-12-21T22:33:10Z.status: Sexually Active   Asa Moses James, known by the ladies as "Little D" a nickname he received once exposing himself during a world war 1 USSO show. He lived his entire life by telling people he was the brother of moses, and traveled with him on many voyages. He drinks mountain dew, and pisses funny colors. He was once known to give "favors" in the slums of Abubbadriziack. Little D was drew up plans for what we now call the modern day condom. His original plan was to keep his head warm. During the Great Depression, James became a sensation performing acts on the side of the road. James started the "Bigfoot" act to raise money for the Monkey's with aides foundation. James also believed he could cure aides, simply by spreading fecal matter over the infected area. He's had many wives over the years his most famous wife of course was Queen Elizabeth the III. Tales say he once had the chance to become King of all of England till he got too drunk and brought out "lil D" during a kids puppet show. To cover up the incident the Queen had to insist it was just an Earthworm. He eventually set on a journey with Columbus to America. On the first Thanksgiving he also was known to let his friend "Lil D" join the whites and natives for all the festivals. He has over 1200 indecent exposure arrests in his lifetime. He once spent $9 on lunch and had to spend the next 27 years recouping what he had lost. He has a large tattoo on his back of Elton John. James is known to be the influence of the academy acclaimed hit "Rocket Man". James had many celebrity friends over the years some of the more famous names are James Wilkes Booths, The Undertaker, Marilyn Manson, and who could forget the modern day president Obama, whom he is credited for most of his ideas. James now resides in Murfreesboro, TN where he plans to stay for the next century. One thing is for sure no one knows what tales and adventures are in store for Lil D.
